mapper.select: SELECT cs.session_id,cs.user_id,u.username,cs.consultant_id,c.name,cs.start_time FROM ConsultationSessions cs JOIN Users u ON cs.user_id = u.user_id JOIN Consultants c ON cs.consultant_id = c.consultant_id WHERE cs.session_status = 'ready' AND cs.start_time <= NOW() - INTERVAL 5 MINUTE

SELECT YEARWEEK(start_time, 1) AS week, COUNT(*) AS total, MIN(DATE(start_time - INTERVAL (WEEKDAY(start_time)) DAY)) AS week_start FROM ConsultationSessions WHERE YEARWEEK(start_time, 1) >= YEARWEEK(CURDATE(), 1) - (#{num}-1) GROUP BY YEARWEEK(start_time, 1) ORDER BY week_start;
